trans-unit.source: Represents a value provider for single key/value lookups.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个键/值查找的值提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This class does not contain the actual look-up mechanism; it delegates that to derived classes using the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider.FetchValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此类不包含实际的查找机制中;它将该委托给派生类使用<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider.FetchValue%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider.FetchValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Examples of simple value providers are the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ViewStateValueProvider> class and the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ControlValueProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 简单值在提供程序的示例包括<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ViewStateValueProvider>类和<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ControlValueProvider>类。</xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ControlValueProvider> </xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ViewStateValueProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider"></xref> class by using the specified execution context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider"></xref>通过使用指定的执行上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: The execution context.
trans-unit.target: 执行上下文中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider"></xref> class by using the specified execution context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider"></xref>通过使用指定的执行上下文和区域性信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The execution context.
trans-unit.target: 执行上下文中。

trans-unit.source: The culture information.
trans-unit.target: 区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the value provider contains the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示值提供程序是否包含指定的前缀。

trans-unit.source: The prefix.
trans-unit.target: 前缀。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value provider contains the specified prefix; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果值提供程序包含指定的前缀;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The prefix parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The prefix parameter is .

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns the value for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，返回指定键的值。

trans-unit.source: The key of the value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的值的键。

trans-unit.source: The value.
trans-unit.target: 值。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider.FetchValue*> method and then uses the returned value to instantiate a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.ValueProviderResult"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider.FetchValue*>方法，然后使用返回的值来实例化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.ValueProviderResult"></xref>类</xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.SimpleValueProvider.FetchValue*>

trans-unit.source: The key of the value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的值的键。

trans-unit.source: The value.
trans-unit.target: 值。

trans-unit.source: The key parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The key parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the execution context.
trans-unit.target: 获取执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: The execution context.
trans-unit.target: 执行上下文中。
